General.Name: Hwashin Precision Engineering Co. Ltd
General.Description: Hwashin Precision Engineering Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies automobile components in South Korea. The company offers chassis components, such as front cross member, front lower arm, rear coupled torsion beam axle, rear cross member, rear lower ram, rear trailing arm, rear assist arm, front upper arm, rear axle housing assembly, pedal, and fuel tank. It also provides body related products, including reinf side outer, fender apron and member, center and rear floor, cowl complete and cross bar, bumper rail, and sun roof reinf. The company was formerly known as Hwashin Clutch Corporation and changed its name to Hwashin Precision Engineering Co., Ltd. in December 1995. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Yeongcheon, South Korea. Hwashin Precision Engineering Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Hwashin Group.

1.Name: Mr. Yeon Kyu  Kim
1.Title: Deputy Department Head of Designing Team
